item.title: Federal trade court strikes down Trump's reciprocal tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court could end up ruling if Trump has authority under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act to impose universal duties on impor...

item.title: Slovak central bank governor Kazimir guilty of corruption, court rules
item.description: A Slovak court ruled on Thursday that central bank governor and European Central Bank policymaker Peter Kazimir is guilty of corruption, a judge said.

item.title: Trump says he's not 'chickening out' on trade: 'It's called negotiation'
item.description: TACO, the term that stands for "Trump Always Chickens Out," describes the market reaction to Trump repeatedly announcing heavy tariffs and later pausi...

item.title: Vince McMahon sex trafficking case co-defendant John Laurinaitis agrees to help accuser
item.description: The moves comes three weeks after Janel Grant filed an amended lawsuit against wrestling mogul Vince McMahon, WWE and John Laurinaitis.

item.title: Justice Department investigates California over trans athletes after Trump threatens funding
item.description: President Trump said in a social media post that it is "not fair" that a transgender athlete was allowed to compete against women in California.
